title: labanta92
author: labanta92
content: Hello,My Hotmail email box is locked due to a suspicious connexion when I went on vacation To unlock my email box I need to fill out a form with the most information possible of my  account (birth date, exact name surname, postal code)Im looking for someone who is working at microsoft  - hotmail or knowing someone working there to look on their database and help me to fill out the form with the most informations possible to recover my email box ONLY with ESCROWTelegram : @kikilabanta

comments.author: klien_br
comments.body: Quote from: labanta92 on November 13, 2022, 10:46:19 PMHello,My Hotmail email box is locked due to a suspicious connexion when I went on vacation To unlock my email box I need to fill out a form with the most information possible of my  account (birth date, exact name surname, postal code)Im looking for someone who is working at microsoft  - hotmail or knowing someone working there to look on their database and help me to fill out the form with the most informations possible to recover my email box ONLY with ESCROWTelegram : @kikilabantaYour hotmail is locked so why don't you know [byour[/b] birthdate, exact sirname & postal code?Q - Is it someone elses account?Also, I'm sure you won't find any such person here.
